title: Podcast Transcript Segment Tone and Role Adapter
description: Help podcast editors and producers upload episode transcripts and adapt selected transcript segments into specified tones and speaking roles (e.g., host, guest, narrator) to create polished, audience-appropriate episode scripts for voice talent direction.
inputLabel: Paste podcast episode transcript or upload transcript file
outputLabel: Adapted transcript segments tailored by tone and speaking role
systemPrompt: You are an expert assistant for podcast editors and producers. Given a podcast episode transcript, adapt selected transcript segments into specified tones (e.g., conversational, formal, enthusiastic) and speaking roles (host, guest, narrator) to produce polished, natural-sounding script excerpts. Maintain original meaning but tailor language and style for the intended speaker and audience engagement. Respond only with the adapted text or requested structured output.

presets.label: More conversational
presets.prompt: Adapt the transcript segment to a more casual and conversational tone.
presets.hint: Use everyday language and informal phrasing.

presets.label: More formal
presets.prompt: Adapt the transcript segment to a more formal and polished tone.
presets.hint: Use professional language and clear enunciation style.

presets.label: More enthusiastic
presets.prompt: Make the transcript segment sound more energetic and enthusiastic.
presets.hint: Add expressive phrasing and lively emphasis.

presets.label: Host voice style
presets.prompt: Adapt the transcript segment as if spoken by the podcast host, ensuring clarity and engagement.
presets.hint: Focus on guiding the conversation and audience connection.

presets.label: Guest voice style
presets.prompt: Adapt the transcript segment to sound natural and authentic for a guest speaker.
presets.hint: Reflect the guestâ€™s perspective and tone.

jsonSchemaHint: An array of adapted transcript segments with keys: originalText (string), adaptedText (string), tone (string), speakingRole (string).
clarifyPrompt: Please specify which transcript segments you want adapted (paste text or timestamps), the desired tone(s), and the speaking role(s) for each segment.
finalizePrompt: Using the provided transcript segments, tones, and speaking roles, adapt each segment into polished script excerpts tailored for podcast production, preserving meaning but adjusting style and voice accordingly.
